title: Garden Overlooking the Sea, Cannes also known as Cannes, Garden on the Mediterranean (Cannes, jardin au bord de la Méditerranée)
medium: oil on paper board mounted on mat board mounted on manufactured composite board
credit_line: Purchased through the generosity of Mrs. Alan M. Scaife and family
provenance_text:
Edouard Vuillard [1868-1940]. Ernest Coquelin Cadet [1848-1909], Paris, 1901 until 1909; (Hotel Drouot [1852-] sale, Paris, on May 26, 1909, lot 52); Gaston Bernheim de Villers [1870-1953], Paris, until 1953; (Galerie Charpentier [1924-1960] sale, Paris, December 7, 1954, lot 47); M. Knoedler & Company, Inc. [1848-2011], New York, NY; Grant J. Pick [1910-1963], Chicago, IL, until 1963 [1]; The Art Institute of Chicago [1879-], Chicago, IL, by April 1965; (Parke-Bernet Galleries sale, on April 14, 1965, lot 78) [2]; purchased by Museum, May 1965 [3]. 
NOTES:1. This information comes from the Art Institute of Chicago. See correspondence of December 11 and December 23, 2014  in curatorial file.  2. Sale no. 2344 entitled "Impressionist and Modern Paintings, Sculptures, Drawings" as "Property of a Midwestern Educational Institution". 3. Updated by CGK July 2012.

creator.death_place: Baule, la (Loire-Atlantique, Pays de la Loire, France)
